quoteText: If any provision of these Terms of Service is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable for any reason, such provision shall be eliminated or limited to the minimum extent such that the remaining provisions of the Terms of Service will continue in full force and effect.
title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
